Name: BLASTER LiLO
About the game: Blast your way through an endless flow of enemies while you reach for unthinkable scores in this survival shoot'em up. Features: -Endless survival with increasing difficulty -Flashy pixel graphics -Easy controls: just two buttons for shoot in the different directions and one button for the BLASTER BOMB -4 characters, each with his unique shoot -9 different enemies -5 devastating powerups -A crazy original OST -Dodge, aim and grab powerups with the precision of the mouse -Multiplayer battle: challenge other players who survive the most or who reach a score first
Meta Title: BLASTER LiLO: Dec 28, 2018, Fabio Cardini and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on BLASTER LiLO? Check out the release date (Dec 28, 2018), developer insights from Fabio Cardini, and a complete game summary.
